name: Dark Strokes: Sins of the Fathers
name_original: Dark Strokes: Sins of the Fathers
description:
Guide Ethan Blake as he attempts to rescue his bride-to-be from a terrifying menace known as the Faceless Ones!
Guide Ethan as he explores a decimated city, interacts with its remaining inhabitants, searches for clues that will lead him to his beloved Clair, and peels back the layers of a chilling supernatural mystery that began with the stroke of a paint brush and will end in a dramatic confrontation near a fiery abyss.

GAME FEATURES:
58 locations
16 mini-games
20 hidden object scenes
Unlimited hints and tips
Tutorial

FIND US in FACEBOOK: AlawarEntertainment
